text: @kerpen Now would be a good time to note that with this knowledge #NYGov Andrew Cuomo's Heath Department still mandated nursing homes in NY to admit coronavirus patients & OK allowing coronavirus infected staff to continue to work in nursing homes. They murdered hundreds.
